featured.text: Both issues result from the tide of violence that has crossed the region in recent years.
It contains no violence or strong language.

The report states that 40% of all children across the region are currently not receiving an education, which is a result of two consequences of violence: structural damage to schools and the displacement of populations, also called “forced migration.”
Worse yet, exposure to graphic violence and bloodshed can make them less sensitive to real-life violence and more accepting of aggression.

other.text: Why there are civil wars and violence in the Middle East.
Across these countries, violence has made 8,500 schools unusable.
Within the country, the quality and availability of education depends on whether a particular region is suffering violence.

definition.zh_def: 暴力是指使用力量或武力來傷害他人或破壞財物的行為。
definition.en_def: Violence is the use of physical force to harm someone or damage property.
definition.example: The movie depicts the consequences of violence in society.
